scripts.database:migrate:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:pull:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma db pull && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:push:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma db push && npx prisma generate
scripts.seed:dev: docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
